thread.title: Who Is Gary At the 2017 Oscars? Jimmy Kimmel Brings Tourists On Stage at the Academy Awards
thread.title_full: Who Is Gary At the 2017 Oscars? Jimmy Kimmel Brings Tourists On Stage at the Academy Awards

author: Matt Miller
title: Who Is Gary At the 2017 Oscars? Jimmy Kimmel Brings Tourists On Stage at the Academy Awards
text: By Matt Miller Feb 26, 2017 Gary wasn't just hanging out with his fiancée in Hollywood on Oscar night by accident. No. Gary knew exactly what he was doing. Along with his wife-to-be, Gary—dressed in his ball cap, hoodie, and gym shorts—planned on making it a night they would never forget. They were going to the Oscars. The rest of these people might have been clueless random strangers wide-eyed on stage, but Gary isn't a lost tourist. He planned on doing two things: 1) Getting married by Denzel Washington, 2) and dethroning Ken Bone as the internet's favorite regular guy. Advertisement - Continue Reading Below
